title: Deleting a model in bullet causes a crash

content.raw:
backtrace:


```
#!c++

    fixedTimeStep=0.00100000005) at /home/ian/packages/bullet-2.81-rev2613/src/BulletDynamics/Dynamics/btDiscreteDynamicsWorld.cpp:449
#9  0x00007ffff2f8c3fc in gazebo::physics::BulletPhysics::UpdatePhysics (this=0xa29190)
```
